input_args.passage: 'Answers in Genesis - Wikipedia | The organization sees evolution as incompatible with the Bible and believes anything other than the young Earth view is a compromise on the principle of biblical inerrancy., a compromise on the principle of biblical inerrancy'
input_args.claim: 'From source, we can gather that Creation Ministries International (CMI) holds the belief that the creation of the world is only thousands of years old, based on their acceptance of the chronology in Genesis.'
